name: A comet will hit the earth in 2 minutes - Save the Children

description:
A comet will hit the earth in 2 minutes - Save the Children is a game developed by Matthew. It was originally released in 2016.
You can play A comet will hit the earth in 2 minutes - Save the Children on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
